name: Shipping and Tracking Services
description: Australia Post Shipping and Tracking Services

GetAccounts.summary: This interface retrieves information regarding the requestor's charge account and the postage products that the charge account is able to use.

account_number.description: Account number used to retrieve accounts

GetItemPrices.summary: This interface retrieves valid postage products and pricing based upon the merchant location address, destination, and details of the parcel.

DeleteItem.summary: This service deletes an item in a shipment for shipments that have not been included in an order.

shipment_id.description: The shipmentId parameter refers to the unique Australia Post generated shipment_id

item_id.description: The itemId parameter refers to the unique Australia Post generated item_id

GetShipments.summary: This service retrieves the information against shipments and the items contained within for shipments created using the Create Shipments interface.

shipment_ids.description: A comma separated list of shipment ids

offset.description: The offset parameter value specifies the numeric value of the first record to be returned in the result, beginning at 0. If you specify the offset parameter, you must also specify the number_of_shipments parameter.

number_of_shipments.description: The number_of_shipments parameter specifies the number of records to return in the result. If you specify the number_of_shipments parameter, you must also specify the offset parameter.

status.description: Setting the status parameter will result in the list returned only containing shipments that are at the given status. The parameter will accept one or more status values separated by a comma. E.g. status=CREATED,INITIATED

despatch_date.description: Setting the despatch_date parameter will result in the list returned only containing shipments that have one of the values as despatch_date. The parameter will accept one or more despatch_date values in the format of yyyy-MM-dd separated by a comma. E.g. despatch_date=2016-04-04,2015-12-31

sender_reference.description: Setting the sender_reference parameter will result in the list returned only containing shipments that have one of the values as sender_reference. The parameter will accept one or more sender_reference values separated by a comma. E.g. sender_reference=MYREF-12345

CreateShipments.summary: This interface creates a shipment with items and returns a summary of the pricing for the items.

UpdateShipment.summary: This service updates an existing shipment that has previously been created using the Create Shipment interface.

DeleteShipment.summary: This service deletes one or more shipments that have not been included in an order.

shipment_id.description: The shipment id you wish to delete

shipment_ids.description: A comma separated list of shipment ids

GetShipmentPrice.summary: This interface retrieves shipment level pricing based upon the merchant location address, destination, and details of the parcel product selected. For convenience, the interface is compatible with the Create Shipment interface and accepts the same field details, The calculated price is related to your available postage products and contract rates.

CreateLabels.summary: This service initiates the generation of labels for the requested shipments that have been previously created using the Create Shipments service.

GetLabel.summary: This service returns information on a label request created using the Create Labels service.

request_id.description: the label to retrieve by id

GetOrder.summary: This service returns information related to the order previously created using the Create Order From Shipments or Create Order Including Shipments services.

order_id.description: The identifier for the order generated by Australia Post

GetOrderSummary.summary: This service returns the PDF order summary that contains a charges breakdown of the articles in the order.

account_number.description: Numeric id of the charge account to query. . Note this is a parameter to the request in addition to the account-number header field.

order_id.description: The order id you wish to retrieve the summary for

CreateOrderFromShipments.summary: This service creates an order for the referenced shipments that have previously been created using the Create Shipments service.

CreateOrderIncludingShipments.summary: This service creates an order for the contained shipments and items. This service can be used when the item and shipment information is maintained within the client system and only required to be sent to Australia Post when the shipments are confirmed. This service will create an order using only the information contained within the single bulk order request. You may choose to provide all consignment, article, and barcode identifiers (tracking_details field) and then generate and print your own labels. If you don't provide tracking_details, the consignment and article identifiers are created by this service. And then you can use the Create Labels API service to have the labels generated by Australia Post along with the barcode identifier.

ValidateSuburb.summary: This service validates a suburb, state, and postcode combination for an Australian postal address and returns the valid suburbs for the given state and postcode.

tracking_ids.description: A comma separated list of tracking numbers

shipment_id.description: The shipment id you wish download the Dangerous Goods PDF document for
